product_name: Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 600 2-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Great for spring and summer backpacking, this clever sleeping bag moves as you do, so you can sleep comfortably in any position you like. And, it quickly converts so you can wear it as a jacket!
short_description: Great for spring and summer backpacking, this clever sleeping bag moves as you do, so you can sleep comfortably in any position you like. And, it quickly converts so you can wear it as a jacket!
